title: UK Complaint Procedure
content:
pixel 3 screen was cracked in the top right corner and there is paint work missing from the top edge of the glass back. 
I've raised to Chat and emailed support and they are saying as I waited 30 hours to contact Google it is my fault the screen is broken. This is against UK Consumer Law. 
Ive stated UK Consumer Law .
I've sent 13 emails and ask for management to speak to me and also for the complaints procedure but all I get back is the specialist team advise to get the phone fixed myself at my own cost. 
I want to raise a formal complaint and need to know how, I cannot find anything with complaint details or procedure for UK Google.
